p:
Dosage of inflammatory mediators: through conjunctival smears and conjunctival secretion, with an absorbent ophthalmic sponge, performed only in the most symptomatic eye
13 , 14 , at the last evaluation. The kit - cat HCYTOMAG - 60K - 07 was used to measure the following cytokines: IFNg, IL – 1a, IL - 6, IL - 8, IL - 10, IL - 13, TNF-a. Kit 46-702 MAG / MILLIPLEX MAP Ⓡ, for NFkB. Kit cat # MBS723617 for iNOS.
